author: Simon Difford
description: We recommend the Derby Fizz with its combination of liqueur and spirits over these more traditional versions.
name: Fizz (generic name)
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Brandy, whisk(e)y, gin, rum etc.
30 ml Freshly squeezed lemon or lime juice
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass (no ice in glass)
TOP with soda (ideally dispensed from a siphon)
